commands: su ssm-user --shell bash -c 'export KUBECONFIG=/home/ssm-user/sample-cluster/sample-cluster-eks-a-cluster.kubeconfig; cd /home/ssm-user; set -o pipefail; kubectl apply -f ./curated-amp-adot-sa.yaml'

su ssm-user --shell bash -c 'export KUBECONFIG=/home/ssm-user/sample-cluster/sample-cluster-eks-a-cluster.kubeconfig; cd /home/ssm-user; set -o pipefail; eksctl anywhere delete package curated-amp-adot --cluster sample-cluster 2> /dev/null; eksctl anywhere create packages -f ./curated-amp-adot-package.yaml'
